page.title: 06 HOUSING & EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Before we came there was a factory which was started by the Mason brothers in 1886. They employed 1500 people. They made tins and shoe polish. It was knocked down in the 1970s and then Staveley Gardens was built. The people who live there are young families. Most of them have got cars but we haven't, so it is hard for my mum to get the shopping home. The people who live in "The Old Gran's" are mostly pensioners of the company. Our house has got two bedroom and one bathroom. It's got a front and a back garden. The people are very nice in Staveley . My mum pops in and out of our next-door neighbour's. I'm never on my own round Staveley. We do not use the new community centre, we are going to join but not just yet.
